programs.name: Massage Therapy Program

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Practice techniques on real clients from day one in a professional spa environment.

highlights.label: Small Class Sizes
highlights.description: Personal attention and individualized instruction in an intimate learning setting.

highlights.label: Exam/Career Ready
highlights.description: Graduate with the skills needed to work in spas, wellness centres, or start your own practice or take the exam to become a registered massage therapist.

programs.tagline: Master the art of therapeutic massage
programs.outcome: Become a certified massage therapist ready for professional practice
programs.description: This 7-week Massage Therapy Program trains students to provide Swedish, Deep Tissue, Aromatherapy, and Hot Stone massage while mastering professional workplace skills such as client consultation, workspace sanitization, session preparation, customer service, and retail practices.

capabilities.outcome: Operate **professionally** in a real Massage Therapy environment

competencies.statement: Meet and greet clients professionally
Receive and direct clients appropriately
Conduct client consultation and preparation for therapy
Maintain workspace sanitization, safety, and hygiene
Plan and organize massage therapy work
Deliver quality service and maintain customer relations
Perform interactive workplace communication

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Anatomy and Physiology** knowledge to massage therapy

competencies.statement: Understand the muscular and skeletal system
Apply anatomy and physiology knowledge to massage therapy
Identify muscles used in Swedish, Deep Tissue, and Hot Stone massage

capabilities.outcome: Perform full-body **Swedish Massage** safely and effectively

competencies.statement: Perform effleurage, petrissage, friction, tapotement, and vibration
Deliver a full-body Swedish massage session
Perform Swedish massage using aromatic oils
Maintain client comfort and safe technique during massage

capabilities.outcome: Deliver **Deep Tissue Massage** with appropriate pressure and control

competencies.statement: Understand principles and benefits of deep tissue massage
Apply deep tissue techniques to major muscle groups
Manage client pressure and comfort during deep tissue massage

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Aromatherapy Massage** using essential oils safely

competencies.statement: Understand the fundamentals of aromatherapy
Identify essential oils, their properties, and safety considerations
Blend oils and perform aromatherapy massage safely

capabilities.outcome: Perform full-body **Hot Stone Massage** treatments

competencies.statement: Use heated stones safely during massage
Apply proper placement and technique with hot stones
Integrate hot stones with other massage techniques
Deliver a full-body hot stone massage session

capabilities.outcome: Close sessions professionally and support **Post-Treatment Care**

competencies.statement: Close massage sessions professionally
Provide appropriate product recommendations
Provide post-treatment client care guidance
Perform retail and client follow-up procedures

certification.description: Receive a certificate of participation upon successful completion of the program.

testimonials.author: Angella ShandDyer
testimonials.content: I happen to have had first hand experience with this lady as my trainer when i was doing the makeup artistry course. She is very patient and technically sound. Her training techniques definitely moved my skill level up several notches. Thank you Alicia for all the encouragement you gave…you made me beleive I could do it ..and I did.

testimonials.author: Rickae Crossman
testimonials.content: Dear Miss Davis, I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for all the support and guidance you've provided throughout this course. Your passion for teaching and dedication to helping us learn has truly made a difference in my experience. Thank you for being patient, approachable, and always willing to help. I've learned so much from you, and I appreciate the effort you put into making our classes engaging and meaningful. Thank you once again for everything! Rickae

programs.name: Professional Waxing Program

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Practice full-body waxing techniques on real clients in a professional spa environment with both hard and soft wax methods.

highlights.label: Focused Schedule
highlights.description: Convenient Monday evening classes (6:00 PM - 9:00 PM) designed to fit into your busy schedule.

highlights.label: Certificate Included
highlights.description: Receive a professional certificate upon successful completion of the program.

highlights.label: Career Ready
highlights.description: Graduate with the skills needed to work in spas, salons, or start your own waxing practice.

programs.tagline: Master professional waxing techniques for full-body hair removal
programs.outcome: Become a certified waxing specialist ready for professional practice in spa or salon environments
programs.description: The Professional Waxing Program is designed to equip learners with the theoretical knowledge, technical skills, and professional standards required to perform safe, effective, and high-quality waxing services in a spa or salon environment. This program blends hands-on practical training with essential theory, sanitation, client care, and customer service competencies aligned with spa therapy standards. Program runs for 4 weeks, meeting Mondays from 6:00 PM – 9:00 PM.

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Spa Therapy & Professional Practice** standards to waxing services

competencies.statement: Meet and greet clients professionally
Conduct professional client consultations
Identify contraindications to waxing services
Provide appropriate before and after care advice
Maintain professional ethics and conduct
Apply client education for post-treatment care

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Hard Wax** techniques safely and effectively

competencies.statement: Understand the properties and applications of hard wax
Properly heat and prepare hard wax
Apply hard wax correctly to different body areas
Remove hard wax with proper technique

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Soft Wax** techniques safely and effectively

competencies.statement: Understand the properties and applications of soft wax
Properly heat and prepare soft wax
Apply soft wax with strips correctly
Remove soft wax strips with proper technique

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Full Body Waxing Procedures** on all treatment areas

competencies.statement: Perform Full Leg Wax safely and effectively
Perform Full Arm Wax safely and effectively
Perform Brazilian Wax with professional technique and client comfort
Perform Bikini Wax safely and effectively
Perform Underarm Wax safely and effectively
Perform Full Face Wax including eyebrows with precision
Perform Back Wax safely and effectively
Perform Tummy Wax safely and effectively

capabilities.outcome: Maintain **Safe, Clean and Efficient Work Environment**

competencies.statement: Maintain a Safe, Clean and Efficient Work Environment – CSBCOR0011A
Set up waxing treatment areas efficiently
Perform post-treatment sanitization procedures
Follow infection control protocols
Maintain workspace organization and hygiene standards

capabilities.outcome: Prepare clients for waxing treatment services

competencies.statement: Prepare clients for waxing treatment services
Assess client needs and skin conditions
Position clients appropriately for different waxing procedures

capabilities.outcome: Plan and organize waxing work

competencies.statement: Plan and Organize Work – CSBCOR0021A
Schedule and manage waxing treatment sessions
Organize supplies and equipment for treatments

capabilities.outcome: Deliver quality customer service and maintain client relations

competencies.statement: Receive and Direct Clients – CSBCOS0002A
Deliver Quality Service to Customers – CSBCOR0041A
Maintain Customer Relations – CSBCOR0003A
Perform Interactive Workplace Communication – CSBCOR0001A
Build client trust through professional service

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Solution Sales 101** for upselling and client retention

competencies.statement: Solution Sales 101 (Upselling & Client Retention)
Recommend appropriate waxing services based on client needs
Upsell additional services effectively

certification.description: Receive a certificate of participation upon successful completion of the program.

items.notes: Towels (small & large for full leg and arm draping)
Towels (small & large for full leg and arm draping)
Small Mirror (for precision, brow shaping & client consultation)

programs.name: Spa Therapy Program

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Practice professional spa treatments including dry body brushing, body scrubs, body wraps, hydrotherapy, and paraffin wax treatments in a real spa environment.

highlights.label: Small Class Sizes
highlights.description: Personal attention and individualized instruction with maximum 2 students per class.

highlights.label: Certificate Included
highlights.description: Receive a professional certificate upon successful completion of the program.

highlights.label: Career Ready
highlights.description: Graduate with the skills needed to work in spas, wellness centres, or start your own practice.

programs.outcome: Become a certified spa therapist ready for professional practice in spa, wellness, and beauty therapy environments
programs.description: The Spa Therapy Program is a professional 7-week vocational training designed to prepare learners for spa, wellness, and beauty therapy environments. The program emphasizes hands-on spa treatments, holistic body care, client preparation, sanitation, and professional customer service. Learners are trained in dry body brushing, body scrubs, body wraps, hydrotherapy, and paraffin wax treatments, supported by anatomy and physiology knowledge, workplace communication, and solution-based service recommendations. Classes are held Wednesdays, Thursdays & Fridays from 6:00 PM – 9:00 PM.

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Dry Body Brushing** techniques safely and effectively

competencies.statement: Perform dry body brushing for exfoliation and lymphatic stimulation
Apply proper technique and pressure during dry body brushing
Understand the benefits and contraindications of dry body brushing

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Body Scrub Treatments** according to client needs

competencies.statement: Apply Body Scrub – CSBMTH0043A
Prepare and apply salt, sugar, and ground coffee scrubs
Select appropriate scrub based on client skin type and needs

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Body Wrap Treatments** (Detox, Hydrating & Relaxation Wraps)

competencies.statement: Apply Body Wrap Treatments (Detox, Hydrating & Relaxation Wraps)
Prepare and apply clay, mud, seaweed, and herbal wraps
Understand the therapeutic benefits of different wrap types
Use plastic wrap and thermal sheets appropriately

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Hydrotherapy** treatments

competencies.statement: Apply Hydrotherapy – CSBMTH005
Understand the principles and benefits of hydrotherapy
Perform hydrotherapy treatments safely

capabilities.outcome: Provide **Paraffin Wax Treatment**

competencies.statement: Provide Paraffin Wax Treatment – CSBMTH003A
Prepare and apply paraffin wax safely
Use paraffin wax liners appropriately

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Anatomy & Physiology** knowledge to beauty therapy treatments

competencies.statement: Apply Knowledge of Anatomy & Physiology to Beauty Therapy Treatments
Understand the body systems relevant to spa treatments
Apply anatomical knowledge to treatment selection and application

capabilities.outcome: Maintain **Safe, Clean and Efficient Work Environment**

competencies.statement: Maintain a Safe, Clean and Efficient Work Environment – CSBCOR0011A
Set-Up and After-Treatment Sanitization
Follow infection control protocols
Maintain workspace organization and efficiency

capabilities.outcome: Prepare clients for therapeutic service

competencies.statement: Prepare Clients for Therapeutic Service – CSBMTH0011A
Conduct professional client consultations
Assess client needs and contraindications

capabilities.outcome: Plan and organize spa therapy work

competencies.statement: Plan and Organize Work – CSBCOR0021A
Schedule and manage treatment sessions
Organize supplies and equipment

capabilities.outcome: Deliver quality customer service and maintain client relations

competencies.statement: Receive and Direct Clients – CSBCOS0002A
Deliver Quality Service to Customers – CSBCOR0041A
Maintain Customer Relations – CSBCOR0003A
Perform Interactive Workplace Communication – CSBCOR0001A

capabilities.outcome: Provide solution-based service recommendations

competencies.statement: Solution Sales 101 (Retail & Service Recommendations)
Recommend appropriate spa services based on client needs
Recommend retail products confidently

certification.description: Receive a certificate of participation upon successful completion of the program. Assessment includes Theory Examination (40%), Practical Assessment (30%), and Portfolio (30%).
